reasoning: Acute myocardial inflammation typically reported as incidence. Global estimates range 1-10 per 100k person-years; using conservative global average of ~1.5 per 100k. Limited population-based registry data; estimates based primarily on hospital discharge data and autopsy studies.
source: Feldman AM et al. (2000). Myocarditis. N Engl J Med. 343:1388-1398
